scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec postgres psql -U a11yphant -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;" a11yphant
scripts.db:reset:ci: docker run --rm -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD -e POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER postgres psql $POSTGRES_DB -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;"
scripts.db-dump:update: docker compose exec postgres pg_dump -U a11yphant a11yphant > db-dump.sql
scripts.db-dump:import: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U a11yphant a11yphant < db-dump.sql
